title: Kill Bill 2 End Credits - Busorama, ??? {Yves}
content:
Hi all,   
   
There was a previous thread posted on this forum in February ( [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27380.html?1078774045](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122245/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27380.html?1078774045))   
 regarding the typefaces used in Kill Bill.   
   
What I am particularly interested in is the typeface used for the end credits of the \*second\* movie.   
   
Justin Callaghan identified the type "Busorama" as one used in the film, and indeed it is very similar to the one I am looking for. However, there are distinct differences between Busorama and the actual type used in the film - note for example the serifs at the top of the "A" characters!   
   
Can anyone shed some light on this for me?   
   
Much appreciated,   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122245im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) Adam
